none: Macho Boys - Toughest Band In Hardcore demo 2016
Macho Boys - Toughest Band In Hardcore demo 2016

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 23, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
Short and sweet today, punks: MACHO BOYS are from Portland. MACHO BOYS rule hard. MACHO BOYS are important. MACHO BOYS are not what you think. MACHO BOYS are doing it right. I want to be on the MACHO BOYS team. MACHO BOYS.  TOUGHEST BAND IN HARDCORE
https://machoboys.bandcamp.com/releases
